FuncDef:
The local-cross export evpn-rt-match command enables local EVPN route leaking.
The undo local-cross export evpn-rt-match command disables local EVPN route leaking. The local-cross export evpn-rt-match command enables local EVPN route leaking. The undo local-cross export evpn-rt-match command disables local EVPN route leaking. By default, the local EVPN route leaking function is disabled. This command is supported only on the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE6855-48XS8CQ, CE6885-SAN, CE8850-SAN, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P, CE8850-HAM, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6885, CE6885-T, CE6885-LL (standard forwarding mode) and CE6863E-48S8CQ.
ParentView: BGP-VPN instance IPv4 address family view,BGP-VPN instance IPv6 address family view
